name: Baklava
description: Layers of phyllo pastry filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey or syrup.

name: M'hanncha
description: A coiled pastry filled with almond paste and flavored with orange blossom water.

name: Chebakia
description: Deep-fried dough shaped into intricate flowers and dipped in honey syrup.

name: Sellou
description: A traditional Moroccan energy snack made with toasted flour, almonds, and honey.
